contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox record label | name = Yep Roc Records | image = | image_bg = | parent = | founded = 1996 | founder = Glenn Dicker<br />Tor Hansen | defunct = | distributor = [[Redeye Distribution]] | genre = [[Indie music|Indie]] | country = [[United States]] | location = [[Haw River, North Carolina]] | url = http://www.yeproc.com }} '''Yep Roc Records''' is an independent [[International]] [[record label]] based in [[Haw River, North Carolina]] and owned by [[Redeye Distribution]].<ref>[http://www.eleventhirtyrecords.com/label.php Eleven Thirty Records<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> The label has put out [[album]]s by artists like [[The Go-Betweens]], [[The Fleshtones]], [[Gang of Four]], [[The Reverend Horton Heat]], and [[The Minus 5]], as well as the work of important solo artists like [[Robyn Hitchcock]], [[Bob Mould]], [[Paul Weller (singer)|Paul Weller]], [[Kristin Hersh]], [[Nick Lowe]], [[Ken Stringfellow]] and [[John Doe (musician)|John Doe]]. ==Artists== {{div col|3}} *[[Dave Alvin]] *[[American Princes]] *[[The Apples in Stereo]] *[[BeauSoleil]] *[[Bell X1]] *[[Big Sandy & His Fly-Rite Boys]] *[[The Bigger Lovers]] *[[Billy Bragg]] *[[Doyle Bramhall]] *[[The Butchies]] *[[Caitlin Cary]] *[[The Cake Sale]] *[[Peter Case]] *[[Chatham County Line]] *[[Cities (band)|Cities]] *[[Thad Cockrell]] *[[The Comas]] *[[Rodney Crowell]] *[[Spencer Dickinson]] *[[John Doe (musician)|John Doe]] *[[Dolorean]] *[[Drink Up Buttercup]] *[[Amy Farris]] *[[Liam Finn]] *[[The Fleshtones]] *[[Fountains of Wayne]] *[[Robbie Fulks]] *[[Gang of Four]] *[[The Go-Betweens]] *[[The Gourds]] *[[Darren Hanlon]] *[[Heavy Trash]] *[[Heloise and the Savoir Faire]] *[[Kristin Hersh]] *[[Robyn Hitchcock]] *[[Ian Hunter (singer)|Ian Hunter]] *[[The Iguanas (Louisiana band)|The Iguanas]] *[[Jukebox the Ghost]] *[[The Kingsbury Manx]] *[[Laika & the Cosmonauts]] *[[Jim Lauderdale]] *[[Los Straitjackets]] *[[Nick Lowe]] *[[Madness (band)|Madness]] (US distribution) *[[Eleni Mandell]] *[[Marah (band)|Marah]] *[[The Mayflies USA]] *[[Mercury Rev]] *[[The Minus 5]] *[[Ian Moore (singer)|Ian Moore]] *[[The Moaners]] *[[Bob Mould]] *[[The Old Ceremony]] *[[Peggy Sue (band)|Peggy Sue]] *[[Josh Rouse]] *[[Chuck Prophet]] *[[Reckless Kelly (band)|Reckless Kelly]] *[[Radio Birdman]] *[[The Relatives]] *[[The Reverend Horton Heat]] *[[Rock Plaza Central]] *[[The Sadies]] *[[Ron Sexsmith]] *[[Simple Kid]] *[[Robert Skoro]] *[[Sloan (band)|Sloan]] *[[Southern Culture on the Skids]] *[[Chris Stamey]] *[[The Standard (band)|The Standard]] *[[Ken Stringfellow]] *[[Tres Chicas]] *[[Th' Legendary Shack Shakers]] *[[Trailer Bride]] *[[Paul Weller (singer)|Paul Weller]] *[[You Am I]] {{div col end}} == See also == * [[List of record
